Name: One Line: Letters and Codes
About the game: You just received a love letter! But it's written with codes... To read it you will need to solve the puzzles and get codes, which will serve to reveal the words of the letter. Each code is a word. Can you decipher what is written in the letter? Use your mouse or arrow keys to draw the line. Fill the entire board and solve the puzzle. Did something wrong? You can go back easily. Or just right click to delete the line wherever you want. After solving the puzzle you will get a code. Find the code on the letter and discover the secret word. Features No tutorial. Straight to the game . Minimalist design . No score, timer or pressure. Solve the puzzle in your time and enjoy the game experience. 40 unique levels, with progressive difficulty . Get a code at the end of each level to reveal a piece of the letter.
